level.heading: NOTICE OF SUSPENSION, REVOCATION OR DENIAL OF A LICENSE OR CERTIFICATION (ยง0-6603)

level.text: An action to suspend, revoke, or refuse to issue, renew, or restore a license or certification provided for in ยง 7(a) of the Act and Chapter 65 of this Subtitle shall be initiated by a notice of proposed suspension, revocation or denial in accordance with this section in lieu of a notice of violation pursuant to ยง 6601.
The notice of proposed suspension, revocation or denial shall be in writing and shall include the following:
The name and address of the applicant for or holder of the license or certification;
A statement of the proposed action;
A statement of the reasons for the proposed action in compliance with the requirements of ยง 8 of the Act; and
Notice that the Respondent has a right to a hearing at the time and place stated, and is required to file an answer.
